member.name: M:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Controllers.Credenciais.UsuarioController.VerificarDocumentoHabilitado(System.String)
member.summary: Verifica o status de um documento
member.remarks:
Contrato
Requisição url: [URI]/api/versao/verificadocumento/11111111111
Resposta (array) { "situacao": "ativo" }
situações possíveis:
ativo = cadastrado e habilitado para fazer cadastro inativo = cadastrado e INABILITADO para fazer cdastro inexistente = não cadastrado
member.response: Sucesso na busca
Acesso-Negado (Token inválido ou expirado)
Se ocorrer alguma falha no processamento da request

member.name: P:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Identity.JwtTokenOptions.Issuer
member.summary: 4.1.1. "iss" (Issuer) Claim - The "iss" (issuer) claim identifies the principal that issued the JWT.

member.name: P:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Identity.JwtTokenOptions.Subject
member.summary: 4.1.2. "sub" (Subject) Claim - The "sub" (subject) claim identifies the principal that is the subject of the JWT.

member.name: P:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Identity.JwtTokenOptions.Audience
member.summary: 4.1.3. "aud" (Audience) Claim - The "aud" (audience) claim identifies the recipients that the JWT is intended for.

member.name: P:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Identity.JwtTokenOptions.Expiration
member.summary: 4.1.4. "exp" (Expiration Time) Claim - The "exp" (expiration time) claim identifies the expiration time on or after which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processing.

member.name: P:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Identity.JwtTokenOptions.NotBefore
member.summary: 4.1.5. "nbf" (Not Before) Claim - The "nbf" (not before) claim identifies the time before which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processing.

member.name: P:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Identity.JwtTokenOptions.IssuedAt
member.summary: 4.1.6. "iat" (Issued At) Claim - The "iat" (issued at) claim identifies the time at which the JWT was issued.

member.name: P:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Identity.JwtTokenOptions.ValidFor
member.summary: Set the timespan the token will be valid for (default is 120 min)

member.name: P:SantaHelena.ClickDoBem.Services.Api.Identity.JwtTokenOptions.JtiGenerator
